document_data.name: Director
document_data.mainbody: '''Directors''' were [[beholder]] abominations that served as hive shock troops.
document_data.Description: The director was extremely large, being around 9 ft (2.7 m) in diameter. Its central eye was proportionately smaller than that of a true beholder. Directors possessed only six eyestalks atop their bodies and three clawed tentacles located on their undersides. They used these tentacles to ride their mounts.
document_data.Society: A director's primary function was as a cavalry fighter. They possessed a mind-link with specialized riding animals.
document_data.History: [[Calimshan|Calishite]] records suggest that directors may have fought in the [[Eye Tyrant Wars]] and earlier wars in [[Calimshan]], along with other beholder abominations.
